title: Demanding Wall Funding, Trump Balks at Bill to Avert Shutdown
abstract: After the Senate passed a spending bill, conservative anger has President Trump openly mulling whether he would sign it.

multimedia.caption: A deal to avert a government shutdown teetered on Thursday amid growing anger from President Trump.
multimedia.copyright: Samuel Corum for The New York Times
